group_1.textCenter: Now that Hagurin and Kazarin have shown up,@we're all here!
Well, except for Sasha. She's not home yetâ˜…

group_1.textRight: The instructor and Miyuri aren't here either.
They're not here since they're preparing for@the festival, but don't just forget about them...

group_1.textLeft: Don't sound so cold, Shigurin.
Of course I know that.
But us cuties are the ones who got to know each@other with a serious heart-to-heart in the nude.

group_1.textRight: Waah...hold on...

group_1.textLeft: You're not wrong, but...

group_1.textRight: Yeah, it's kind of embarrassing when you put it@like that...

group_1.textLeft: A-anyway, that's not what this is about! We're@talking about the Neo-Magius today, aren't we?
That's what you said, isn't it?
Jun's here, so let's discuss our plans.
I was just making some lighthearted conversation@before we got down to business, y'know?
But well, you see, there are other groups after@the [textYellow:Kimochi].
If we don't at least decide on a plan,@Hagurin will get antsy.

group_1.textRight: Sorry, but before we go any further with this,@can I double check a few things?
Hagumu told me about the Neo-Magius' purpose,@but...
I'm a newcomer, so I'm not sure if I'm@understanding everything correctly.

group_1.textLeft: No prob, it's not like we've got anything to hide.

group_1.textRight: So let me get this straight.@The Neo-Magius is...
...a group of Magical Girls who believe that@Magical Girls are the best.
And by spreading that idea, they're trying to be@above everyone else.
Is that right?

group_1.textLeft: Yup, you nailed it.

group_1.textRight: Okay, next...
You're trying to collect these things called@"[textYellow:Kimochi] stones."
And this will let you get your hands on an@"Automatic Purification System."
All this to stand above not just ordinary people,@but other Magical Girls.
Your goal is to be at the very top of everything.
Did I get all that right?

group_1.textLeft: That's pretty much it.
As far as Shigurin and Hagurin are concerned,@that's our goal, right?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, that's right...
Some people don't approve of@Magical Girl supremacy.
That's why we need to be at the top.
If they don't support it, we'll make them go away so@they can't use the Automatic Purification System...

group_1.textLeft: But we don't want to control them.@We just want them to accept us.
That's all we want...
In short, we want to become gods.
Doesn't that sound cool to you, Kazarin?

group_1.textRight: Well, I don't really have a problem if that's@what you want.
At the very least, we need a world where@Magical Girls receive gratitude.
It seems like it's hard to have confidence@in oneself...
Besides, as long as they accept us,@no one will get hurt, right?
Yeah...

group_1.textLeft: Well then, I'm not going to nitpick your goals.
But, you have pretty high self-esteem, don'tcha?
Whether you admit it or not, you don't seem to@care about what others think of you.

group_1.textRight: I haven't really thought about it, but I wonder...
I just... I don't know why, but I need it.
I need to change the world's perception of me@to change my own.

group_1.textLeft: Hmmm...?
Well, sorry to change the subject, but...
As our plan, how about we just kick back@and do nothing?

group_1.textRight: Huh, that's...our plan...?

group_1.textLeft: After all the people we've gathered...?

group_1.textRight: Yeah...
If we don't hurry, the others will get the@[textYellow:Kimochi] stones...

group_1.textLeft: But it's the last one who collects 'em all@that wins, right?

group_1.textRight: Yeah...

group_1.textLeft: Then, honestly, why should we work so hard now?

group_1.textRight: You mean, we could just steal them all later...?

group_1.textLeft: Yup!
My bae says we need to conserve our strength@until we get our people together.
The instructor and Miyurin are busy until@the festival is over.
Sasha's gone back home to round up folks.
If we attack all on our own and get beat,@we'll look like idiots.

group_1.textRight: You might be right, Himena.
Maybe what we need right now is to reinforce@our foundation.

group_1.textLeft: You get me, Haaaguriiiin.
Hey, Kazarin? Got a problem with our strats?

group_1.textRight: Oh, nah, I'm fine with that plan.

group_1.textLeft: For real? You were looking pretty unhappy.

group_1.textRight: It's just, the reason why I'm fighting has@suddenly become so clear to me...
To change yourself, isn't it...?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I'm supposed to be able to turn@falsehood into truth, to be confident...

group_1.textCenter: Well, I don't really get it, but whatevs.
Let's spend today throwing a welcome party@for Kazarin!
